tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor spends adequate time to understand the patients problem *** ********* **** *********** * His treatments have helped me to bring my type 2 diabetes and thyroid problems under control. Apart from being a endocronologist he can also advice you as a general physician . Example in my case was the diagnosis of my leg muscle pain and stomach pain .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I took my father to consult Dr. Ramachandra to seek his opinion about some endocrinological issues that my father has been suffering from. My choice of the doctor was primarily motivated by other reviews about the doctor on this platform. After almost 3 weeks of interaction, I just have one word for him: EXCELLENT. He's a wonderful human being. Gives his patients all the attention that they need. Once, he even arrived at the hospital to attend to my father in the middle of night. He stayed with us until we were certain that my father was OK. Not sure how many doctors show this kind of care to their patients, and commitment to their profession. Thank you Dr. Ramachandra.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor was very patient to hear my case. Also he took time to understand my problem. Normally Doctors do not ask if We want share any other medical issues but Dr Praveen had asked me.
Dr. Praveen is super friendly, listens to every issue. He doesn't advise too many medicines. Everyone can get a relief instantly after meeting him.
I visited Dr Praveen R at ARKA Hospital, Yelahanka. All hospital staff and Dr are very friendly, explained and guided me well. Overall satisfactory.
He called and listened my problem and suggested some vitamin medicines and expecting the treatment with that
